name: Pearl Forums
short_description: This PHP/mySQL Bulletin Board system is sleek in design, fast, and comes with a wysiwyg editor. Version 2.0 has SpamGuard and other enhancements.  Also released are separate versions of Pearl For Mambo, and Pearl For Biz for business integration.
